description.p: KLettres is an application specially designed to help the user to learn an alphabet in a new language and then to learn to read simple syllables. The user can be a young child aged from two and a half or an adult that wants to learn the basics of a foreign language. There are currently 25 languages available: Arabian, Brazilian Portuguese, Czech, Danish, Dutch, British English, US English, Phonics English, French, German, Hebrew, Hugarian, Italian, Kannada, Low Saxon, Malayalam, Norwegian Bokm√•l, Punjabi, Luganda, Romanized Hindi, Russian, Spanish, Slovak, Telugu and Ukrainian. KLettres provides a special user interface and themes for younger users.
